title: Home Depot worker fatally shot in Florida store, suspect is in custody
description: A man opened fire inside a Home Depot store in the Florida Panhandle, killing a woman

title: How the Maui wildfires are affecting people's physical and mental health
description: As devastating wildfires continue to burn in Maui, experts say the blaze and smoke can impact people's physical and mental health.

title: Judge revokes bail for disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried
description: Disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried has had his bail revoked and he has been immediately remanded to custody of the U.S. Marshals.

title: High school basketball star dies following medical emergency
description: Caleb White, a senior at Pinson Valley High School, died following a medical emergency at his school, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Drone footage shows devastation after Maui fires
description: Drone footage shows extensive devastation in Lahaina, Hawaii, in the wake of deadly wildfires driven by extremely dry conditions and powerful winds.

title: WATCH:  Thousands of rubber ducks float down Chicago River in annual Duck Derby
description: Thousands of rubber ducks raced down the Chicago River and floated to the finish line in the annual Duck Derby, a charity event supporting Special Olympics Illinois.

title: Denver house explodes and partially collapses, hospitalizing 1
description: An explosion caused a four-unit apartment building in Denver to partially collapse, sending one person to the hospital with minor injuries

title: Child dies on asylum-seeker bus headed to Chicago
description: A 3-year-old died while en route to the Chicago area aboard a bus of asylum-seekers on Thursday, according to the Illinois Department of Public Health.

title: Child murderer run out of towns in 1990s faces new charges in 2 Texas killings
description: Texas prosecutors say a man who was convicted of killing a child in the 1980s and then run out of towns following his early release from prison has been indicted on two new murder charges

title: More than 1 million barrels of oil removed from deteriorating tanker moored off Yemen, UN says
description: The United Nations says an environmental disaster has been prevented with the transfer of 1.1 million barrels of oil from a deteriorating tanker moored off the coast of war-torn Yemen

title: Before-and-after satellite images show Maui devastation in stark contrast
description: Before-and-after satellite images show in unmistakable and stark contrast the devastation that wildfires brought to the historic Maui community of Lahaina

title: Tennessee hospital faces civil rights investigation over release of transgender health records
description: Hospital officials have confirmed that Vanderbilt University Medical Center is facing a federal civil rights investigation after turning the medical records of transgender patients over to Tennessee’s attorney general

title: Foundations seek to advance AI for good — and also protect the world from its threats
description: While technology experts sound the alarm on the pace of artificial intelligence development, philanthropists — including long-established foundations and tech billionaires — have been responding with an uptick in grants

title: California judge who's charged with murder texted court staff that he shot his wife, prosecutors say
description: Prosecutors say a Southern California judge accused of killing his wife had texted his court clerk and bailiff afterward to say he had shot her

title: Kenosha police arrested a Black man at Applebee's. The actual suspects were in the bathroom
description: Police in Kenosha, Wisconsin, have launched an internal investigation after a video posted to social media appears to show an officer punching a Black man the officer mistakenly thought was involved in a hit-and-run crash

title: Former Catholic priest admits to sexual misconduct with 11-year-old boy he took on beach vacation
description: A former Catholic priest admits he committed acts of sexual misconduct with a child he met through his pastoral duties

title: Some Real Kosher Ice Cream products recalled as FDA investigates listeria outbreak
description: Real Kosher Ice Cream voluntarily recalled all flavors of Soft Serve On The Go 8-ounce ice cream cups, due to listeria concerns.

title: Attorney general elevates Hunter Biden prosecutor to special counsel
description: Attorney General Merrick Garland has appointed Delaware U.S. Attorney David Weiss as a special counsel in his investigation of President Joe Biden’s son Hunter Biden

title: Illinois Supreme Court finds assault weapons ban constitutional
description: The Illinois Supreme Court found the state's assault weapons ban constitutional. It was passed after the Highland Park shooting last year.

title: Insurers won't cover new Alzheimer's treatment for some customers
description: Some private insurers are balking at paying for the first drug fully approved to slow mental decline in Alzheimer’s patients

title: Celeb hair, makeup and nail stylists: How Hollywood strikes have affected glam squads
description: A world of hair, makeup and manicurists have been idled by the Hollywood strikes at a time when they were still rebuilding from the covid shutdowns

title: UN says 5 staff members kidnapped in Yemen 18 months ago walk free
description: The United Nations says five staff members who were kidnapped in Yemen 18 months ago have walked free

title: 'Strong political force': Biden campaign makes case for VP Kamala Harris
description: President Joe Biden's campaign is making the case for Vice President Kamala Harris' spot on the Democratic ticket in a strategic memo to donors.

title: Family of US publishing exec killed in Italy boat incident urges full investigation
description: The family of a U.S. publishing executive killed in a boating incident in southern Italy is urging Italian authorities to fully investigate the death

title: WATCH:  Rottweiler caught stealing baby’s pacifier
description: A Connecticut mom couldn’t find her newborn baby’s pacifier. To her surprise, another family member had decided to borrow it.

title: Tropical storm weakens after leaving scattered damage in South Korea
description: Flights and trains resumed and power was mostly restored after a tropical storm blew through South Korea, which was preparing a pop concert for 40,000 Scouts whose global Jamboree was disrupted by the weather

title: Who are the detained American citizens released from prison in Iran?
description: Five American citizens considered to be unjustly detained in Iran are now under house arrest, U.S. officials said Thursday

title: A rocket carrying a lunar landing craft has blasted off on Russia's first moon mission in nearly 50 years.
description: A rocket carrying a lunar landing craft has blasted off on Russia's first moon mission in nearly 50 years.

title: Federal judge will hear arguments on potential takeover of New York City's troubled jail system
description: A federal judge has agreed to begin a process that could wrest control of New York City’s troubled jail system away from Mayor Eric Adams

title: Connecticut school district lost more than $6 million in cyber attack, so far gotten about half back
description: Officials in the city of New Haven, Connecticut say more than $6 million was stolen from the public school system in multiple cyberattacks earlier this summer
